title: my skin is gone :(
body:
I paid for the red kennen skin many moons back and now it says the skin is unavailable even to buy again
Do rito often take skins away and is it just.. unlucky, buy another

replies.body: yeah same .. my Champion ship riven skin has gone missing <.<  >.>  <.< so riot if you could replace that.. that would be great

You could find it in your purchase history tab in the store, provided that you didn't buy a billion skins afterwards, it should show your last 20 - 10 skins/champions you bought.
And send a support ticket.

Open a ticket with riot support and find out what happened. They can generally track this, and if you paid for it, they'll have it in their system that you spent the RP, so they'd just give you the skin again or the RP back lol :P
